channel.title: [PI]HELP! Rep++ for best helper
channel.description: i ranged because no1 was replying to my last post. I really need this doing, i have a spawn serverbut i want some items not to be spawnable or only spawnable for donators! PLEASE HELP!!

item.title: [PI]HELP! Rep++ for best helper
item.dc:creator: @Uncalled Uncalled
item.description:
@Uncalled wrote:

Replace your command with:

[code=java]
if (playerCommand.startsWith(“item”)) {
try {
if (!Config.UNSPAWNABLE_ITEMS);
String[] args = playerCommand.split(" ");
if (args.length == 3) {
int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(args[1]);
int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(args[2]);
if ((newItemID <= 20000) && (newItemID >= 0)) {
c.getItems().addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount);
} else {
c.sendMessage(“That item ID does not exist.”);
}
} else {
c.sendMessage(“Wrong usage: (Ex:(::pickup_ID_Amount)(::item 995 1))”);
}
} else {
c.sendMessage(“That item cannot be spawned!”);
} catch(Exception e) {

                                      }
                            }[/code]

Read full topic

item.title: [PI]HELP! Rep++ for best helper
item.dc:creator: @owns_reece owns reece
item.description:
@owns_reece wrote:

[quote=“prison190, post:4, topic:396671”]have you tried making an exception with the actual command? like setting it so for these item id #'s only donators can spawn them. (i dont know what your donater status variable) but mine is memberStatus[/quote]thats what i tried to do but i dont know how

[quote=“Uncalled, post:5, topic:396671”][quote author=owns reece link=topic=493842.msg3610524#msg3610524 date=1306540470]
there isnt a list for unspawnables only untradbles
[/quote]
Create a list of unspawnable items, like so:

public static final int[] UNSPAWNABLE_ITEMS = {ITEM_ID,ITEM_ID,ETC}; //no spawn Then replace your ::item command with this:

			if (playerCommand.startsWith("item")) {
				try {
				if (!Config.UNSPAWNABLE_ITEMS);
					String[] args = playerCommand.split(" ");
					if (args.length == 3) {
						int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(args[1]);
						int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(args[2]);
						if ((newItemID <= 20000) && (newItemID >= 0)) {
							c.getItems().addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount);		
						} else {
							c.sendMessage("That item ID does not exist.");
						}
					} else {
						c.sendMessage("Wrong usage: (Ex:(::pickup_ID_Amount)(::item 995 1))");
					} else {
						c.sendMessage("That item cannot be spawned!");
					}
				} catch(Exception e) {
					
				}
				}

I haven’t tested it so I’m not sure if that will work, but I think it will.[/quote]thanks for this so thats non spawnable items but now i need donors to be able to spawn pk gear but no1 else

EDIT
@uncalled i got this error when compiling:

src\server\model\players\packets\commands.java:63: 'else' without 'if' } else { ^ 1 error Press any key to continue...

Read full topic

item.title: [PI]HELP! Rep++ for best helper
item.dc:creator: @Uncalled Uncalled
item.description:
@Uncalled wrote:

owns reece:

there isnt a list for unspawnables only untradbles

Create a list of unspawnable items, like so:

public static final int[] UNSPAWNABLE_ITEMS = {ITEM_ID,ITEM_ID,ETC}; //no spawn Then replace your ::item command with this:

			if (playerCommand.startsWith("item")) {
				try {
				if (!Config.UNSPAWNABLE_ITEMS);
					String[] args = playerCommand.split(" ");
					if (args.length == 3) {
						int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(args[1]);
						int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(args[2]);
						if ((newItemID <= 20000) && (newItemID >= 0)) {
							c.getItems().addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount);		
						} else {
							c.sendMessage("That item ID does not exist.");
						}
					} else {
						c.sendMessage("Wrong usage: (Ex:(::pickup_ID_Amount)(::item 995 1))");
					} else {
						c.sendMessage("That item cannot be spawned!");
					}
				} catch(Exception e) {
					
				}
				}

I haven’t tested it so I’m not sure if that will work, but I think it will.

Read full topic
